description:
First year high school student Sakamoto isn't just cool, he's the coolest! Almost immediately after starting school, he began attracting everyone's attention. The girls love him, and most of the boys resent him. There's even a boy in the class who works as a model, but who is constantly upstaged by Sakamoto! No matter what tricks the other boys try to play on him, Sakamoto always manages to foil them with ease and grace. Though Sakamoto may seem cool and aloof, he helps others when asked, such as in the case of the boy in his class who was being constantly bullied. No matter what difficulties Sakamoto encounters, he moves through his high school life with confidence and class!

(Source: MangaHelpers)
synonyms: เทพศาสตร์ซากาโมโต้

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_7265687568142)

Freelancer with a desk at [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/). Nakajima is strongly associated with the animated adaptations of the works of [Rumiko Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/96891/), having worked as an animation director on [Urusei Yatsura](https://anilist.co/anime/1293/), [Maison Ikkoku](https://anilist.co/anime/1453/) and [Ranma ½](https://anilist.co/anime/210/) also also serving as the character designer on latter.

She is married to [Tomohiro Hirata](https://anilist.co/staff/122071/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yasuhikofk)

__Fukuda Yasuhiko__ is a Tokyo-born musician, known for his video game and anime soundtracks.

Customi Z (カスタマイZ; Pronounced as Customize) was a 4 member Japanese band. They were formed in 2012 and disbanded in 2016.


Members:

Hama - Vocalist & Keyboardist (2013-2016)
Kurihara Goro (栗原吾郎) - Vocalist & Guitarist (2012-2016)
Izumi Daichi (泉大智) - Drummer (2012-2016)
Terasaka Hiroki (寺坂尚呂己) - Bassist (2012-2016)
He also sang Monochrome no Shoujo (Monochrome Girl) theme song.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_7265687568142)

Freelancer with a desk at [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/). Nakajima is strongly associated with the animated adaptations of the works of [Rumiko Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/96891/), having worked as an animation director on [Urusei Yatsura](https://anilist.co/anime/1293/), [Maison Ikkoku](https://anilist.co/anime/1453/) and [Ranma ½](https://anilist.co/anime/210/) also also serving as the character designer on latter.

She is married to [Tomohiro Hirata](https://anilist.co/staff/122071/).

Freelancer originating from [E&G Films](https://anilist.co/studio/154/).

Frequently works with [Kenji Nakamura](https://anilist.co/staff/102217/), whom he met during his days at [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/) in the early '00s.
